Hama teleports you on a beach, with a gigantic blue mountain a bit further in the land. 'Can you feel this place overflowing with Mercury Psynergy?' Hama asks. You nod.
'That being said, as this place is located in a tropical sea, Mars creatures can also thrive here.'
'A lot can be said about the way Mars and Mercury interract. Water can extinguish a fire, but at the same time, a fire may evaporate water or thaw an ice floe.'

'We cannot easily grasp how Mars and Mercury will behave in the nature. On a battlefield however, what determines which element comes out victorious depends on one thing: The will of their users. Be as impetuous as a torrent!'

'Finally, she appears... Nereid, the daughter of Poseidon. Her looks are not deceiving, she's much more peaceful than her father. She does know how to defend herself if needed though. Today she will simply test you to see if you're worthy of her help, should you need it.'

After the fight is over, Nereid starts giggling. You don't even have the time to feel insulted that you feel like if you were submerged in warm water. 'That looks like a success', Hama remarks. Nereid then puts her fan in front of her face while her turtle swims away, carrying her on its back.
'As usual, I'll send you back to where we came from. Train hard once again, and come back when your practice paid off. The next time, we're gonna try to meet one of the most impressive beings of the seven seas.'

Path of Aqua III.name: Path of Aqua III
Path of Aqua III.FlavourText: Find out about the past of Mercury Adepts, by joining Hama in the middle of the big blue.

Matchups.Flavourtext: You find yourself on a strange ship, with a dragon head on the prow. You see Hama on the bow, looking ahead. 'This is one of a number of ships people from a civilization known as Lemuria used. They, like yourself, were Mercury Adepts, and very proficient ones at that. These are some of the waters they've explored ages ago.  Rather dangerous ones, I might add, but today they will serve as your lesson.'

Perhaps you're wondering where exactly on the ocean we are? We're on the Great Eastern Sea, not too far off from the Sea of Time and Lemuria itself. Lemurians had quite the time exploring these waters eons ago, as the Sea of Time is a cruel part of the Great Eastern Sea. They say numerous ships have gone down both entering and leaving Lemuria. Fortunately for us, we haven't the need to bear it today.'

Lemuria wasn't the only civilization to send out explorers, numerous others did the same. There was conflict to be had over domain of territories both on ocean and on land. Some struggles even resulted in wars, though we are fortunate enough to live in an age where such struggles are long since past.'

Some of these struggles were held on land itself, clashing blades and pitting armies against those that challenged them. Other battles were held on the oceans, where navies sought reign over the waters near the land they coveted; cannonballs were exchanged between sides, ships would close in on others to send in their best warriors in hopes of slaying the enemy crews. It is truly a violent past to behold, one that shouldn't be overlooked.'

Many explorers in the past have witnessed some of the frightful creatures the oceans have to offer. Before you is one of the mightiest, the Kraken. It is a powerful beast, with a reputation to sink ships with little trouble. Part of your test today requires you to fell one yourself.'

You begin to see bubbles ahead of the ship, a bit off the starboard side. These bubbles turn into ripples, then waves. A massive whale breaches the surface, splashing seawater everywhere. Hama seems unphased, and she simply smiles. 'Adept, say hello to Neptune, the guardian of Weyard's Oceans. You will be facing him in battle today as a test of your power.'

Hama, still standing on the bow while watching ahead, smiles. 'You've passed your lesson here today, and proven quite strong as a Mercury Adept. Very well done. I hope you're prepared to face bitter, harsh cold for your final trial...'

Path of Aqua IV.name: Path of Aqua IV
Path of Aqua IV.FlavourText: Please be patient until this chapter becomes available!

Matchups.Flavourtext: You shouldn't be here.

Forest Den.name: Forest Den
Forest Den.FlavourText: The creatue hid in a small den, you need to challenge it before it cuts down the trees and threatens the serenity of Kolima.

Matchups.Flavourtext: 'You humans. Don't you see that the world is better off without your meddling? Let nature and alchemy run wild! This world belongs to the beasts and animals, there is no place for you!'
The beast charges at you. Watch out!

'You... you defeated me. You are no normal human. You are stronger than I expected! As if you controlled the psynergy... but that's impossible! Humans bent on destroying the world, killing every beast in their paths. But you, if you can tame the powers of Alchemy, I want to trust you... for now.'

Snowy Cavern.name: Snowy Cavern
Snowy Cavern.FlavourText: A snow covered cavern serves as the hideout for a certain creature...

Matchups.Flavourtext: 'Ice... good... Ice... preserve... Ice everywhere... means peace', the beast murmurs in a rumbly, deep voice.
The monster takes a big breath through its nostrils, opens its mouth and an onrush of cold air and snow blows into your face.
The beast is defeated. 'Ice... cold... Human.. strong... Gib... bellyrub... pls'

Bloomy Glade.name: Bloomy Glade
Bloomy Glade.FlavourText: In the middle of Mogall Forest, a small glade is filled with an aromatic breeze...

Matchups.Flavourtext: 'Who... who are you? How did you find me, how did you find me in this hidden forest? Are you an elf? Oh, an Adept? A human with the power of Psynergy? No, that can't be... it's nature, us, the kingdom of plants who must spread over Weyard again. Beasts took our place and ate our fruits, then humans came and trampled our saplings. NO! It must stop. I must rid the world of those who harm plants and blow everything not rooted to the ground off the world!'
Flora makes gestures with her hands. You feel vines grasping and wrapping around your legs as the breeze emanating from the spirit picks up.

'You stood your ground... and you showed strength greater than that of a usual human... it must be from the psynergy inside of you. Plants must be protected and have a fair place in this world. Nature must be preserved. Take this task upon yourself, and I will lend my strength to you!'

Megaeras Challenge.name: Megaeras Challenge
Megaeras Challenge.FlavourText: Megaera invites you to battle her. If you win her respect, she might tell you what is going on.

Matchups.Flavourtext: So you came. The spirits are restless, as you may have noticed. It has been eons since this much energy has been available to us. But before I tell you more, show me your power.'
Megaera grabs the two massive swords that are floating by her side. Try your best!

Indeed, you are strong. I feel like I can trust you. The spirits are trying to claim the energy set free by the unleashing of Alchemy for themselves. You may have met some of them already, but believe me when I say that a lot more powerful ones are out there. My task is to protect the human race. The lighthouses you humans created are nearly unlimitted sources of energies and the spirits may be attracted to them. I am enroute to Venus Lighthouse. Will you help me prevent the worst?'

The Way Southwards.name: The Way Southwards
The Way Southwards.FlavourText: On the horizon you can make out the black-red storm clouds, that blackened the sky above you earlier. Is this where your path will lead you next? Please stay patient until this chapter becomes available!

Matchups.Flavourtext: You shouldn't be here.
